text: - This priority for us to ensure

that we are resilient,
infrastructure is there,
our operation is 24-7,

and we can detect anomalies
before it happens.
There is a perfect matchup
between AWS inspiration of growth and us.

We are trying to build
the best of the breed,

the best platform for the
observability that allows us
to move from being reactive
to more proactive monitoring setup.

We are trying to rationalize
the portfolio of the ecosystem

of third party tools that
we have in our landscape.
It allows us to be most cost effective
in our cloud operations.
We have built the complete platform on AWS

using all the cloud native
tools that it has to offer.
We work with CloudWatch dashboard

and link it with almost
70 plus linked accounts
that we have.
What we have seen since 2021,
we have almost saved 25%.

And of course we have improved
our performance by 60%
and our developers love working
on the AWS products and services.
The ecosystem is there for them

and we wanna ship first
product to the market
with a great quality.
We are very customer-centric organization.
We look at the priorities of our customer,
whether it's from the cost,
from the resilience, from the innovation.
And I think so far it's been great.
(bright music)
